message:
Excellent checklist for designers dealing with BAAAD CLIENTS, and we have a lot of them already :)
http://www.topwebdesignschools.org/design-clients/
name: Anatomy of a Web Design Client
caption: www.topwebdesignschools.org
description: We thought it would be fun to take a tongue-in-cheek look at the people who pay the bills:  the web design clients who drive us crazy.
